description: Themes organized by engineering fix bucket. v2.2 splits broad themes (analytics_data_issue, feature_access_question) into specific actionable issues

pinterest_publishing_failure.description: Pins scheduled but not posting to Pinterest - API errors, auth failures, or silent failures
example_intents: My pins are scheduled but never post to Pinterest
Pins showing as scheduled but nothing appears on my boards
pinterest_publishing_failure.engineering_fix: Pinterest API integration, OAuth refresh, error handling, retry logic

pinterest_connection_failure.description: Cannot connect or reconnect Pinterest account - OAuth flow failures
example_intents: I can't connect my Pinterest account
Getting an error when trying to authorize Pinterest
pinterest_connection_failure.engineering_fix: OAuth flow, token refresh, Pinterest API permissions

ghostwriter_generation_failure.description: AI generation fails with error, times out, or produces garbled/truncated output
example_intents: Ghostwriter keeps failing with an error
The AI generated gibberish text
Lost credits due to errors
ghostwriter_generation_failure.engineering_fix: OpenAI API integration, error handling, retry logic, response parsing

ghostwriter_output_mismatch.description: AI generates coherent but wrong content - ignores input, off-topic, wrong tone/format
example_intents: The AI completely ignored what I asked for
Generated content about wrong topic
Asked for kids party, got wedding description
ghostwriter_output_mismatch.engineering_fix: Prompt templates, context injection, model parameters, few-shot examples

ghostwriter_usage_guidance.description: User needs help understanding how to use AI features effectively
example_intents: How do I use Ghostwriter?
What's the best way to write prompts?

billing_flow_error.description: User encounters errors or blocks when trying to cancel, upgrade, or change plan
example_intents: I keep getting an error when trying to cancel
The cancel button doesn't work
billing_flow_error.engineering_fix: Billing flow bugs, Stripe integration, error handling, state management

billing_unexpected_charge.description: User charged when they shouldn't be - after cancellation, wrong amount, duplicate charge, failed payment still charged
example_intents: I was charged after I cancelled
I got charged twice
Payment failed but I was still charged
billing_unexpected_charge.engineering_fix: Billing logic, subscription state management, Stripe webhooks, payment reconciliation

billing_cancellation_request.description: User wants to cancel subscription - no error, just needs to do it or needs help finding it
example_intents: I want to cancel my subscription
How do I cancel?
billing_cancellation_request.engineering_fix: Self-service cancellation flow visibility, UI clarity, confirmation UX

billing_plan_change_request.description: User wants to upgrade, downgrade, or change their plan
example_intents: I want to downgrade to the free plan
How do I upgrade?
Can I switch plans?
billing_plan_change_request.engineering_fix: Plan change flow, proration logic, UI for plan comparison

billing_refund_request.description: User requesting refund for any reason
example_intents: I want a refund
Can I get my money back?
billing_refund_request.engineering_fix: Refund policy clarity, self-service refund flow, support process automation

billing_settings_guidance.description: User needs help with billing settings - update card, change address, view invoices, renewal date
example_intents: How do I update my credit card?
Where can I see my invoices?
When does my subscription renew?
billing_settings_guidance.engineering_fix: Billing settings UI discoverability, self-service options, clearer navigation

account_settings_guidance.description: User needs help with account settings - disconnect accounts, delete account, change email, manage connections
example_intents: How do I disconnect my Pinterest account?
I want to delete my account
How do I remove a connected account?
account_settings_guidance.engineering_fix: Account settings UI, self-service flows, clearer navigation

csv_import_failure.description: CSV upload fails - parsing errors, column mapping issues, validation failures
example_intents: My CSV won't upload
Getting errors when importing CSV
Column mapping failed
csv_import_failure.engineering_fix: CSV parser robustness, validation error messages, column mapping UI

scheduling_failure.description: Scheduled content doesn't post at the right time or at all (general, not Pinterest-specific)
example_intents: My post didn't go out at the scheduled time
Schedule isn't working
scheduling_failure.engineering_fix: Scheduler service reliability, queue processing, timezone handling

scheduling_feature_question.description: User needs help understanding scheduling features - SmartSchedule, spacing, rescheduling
example_intents: How do I schedule a post for tomorrow?
What is SmartSchedule?
How does pin spacing work?
scheduling_feature_question.engineering_fix: Documentation, UI tooltips, onboarding, feature discoverability

analytics_counter_bug.description: Dashboard counters showing wrong values - pin count, post count, or other metrics displaying incorrectly
example_intents: My pin count is showing zero but I posted several pins
The number of scheduled posts is wrong
analytics_counter_bug.engineering_fix: Counter state management, cache invalidation, real-time updates

blog_indexing_failure.description: Tailwind cannot find or index blogs/posts from user's website
example_intents: Why can't Tailwind find the blogs on my site?
My blog posts aren't showing up in Tailwind
blog_indexing_failure.engineering_fix: Blog crawler, RSS parsing, sitemap detection, indexing pipeline

engagement_decline_feedback.description: User reporting that their Pinterest engagement/traffic has declined since using Tailwind - NPS feedback, not a bug
example_intents: My Pinterest traffic has dropped since using Tailwind
Engagement is down 25% since I started using Tailwind
engagement_decline_feedback.engineering_fix: Product education, best practices, scheduling optimization guidance - route to customer success

analytics_interpretation_question.description: User needs help understanding what analytics mean or how to use them
example_intents: What do these numbers mean?
Is my performance good?
No visits - is this working?
analytics_interpretation_question.engineering_fix: In-app explanations, tooltips, help docs, benchmarks, contextual guidance

integration_connection_failure.description: Cannot connect third-party integration - Canva, browser extension, e-commerce platforms
example_intents: I can't connect my Canva account
The browser extension isn't working
integration_connection_failure.engineering_fix: Third-party OAuth flows, API integrations, extension compatibility

integration_feature_question.description: User asking about integration capabilities or how to use them
example_intents: Does Tailwind integrate with Canva?
How do I use the browser extension?
integration_feature_question.engineering_fix: Integration documentation, feature education, marketing clarity

professional_services_inquiry.description: User asking about managed services, account management, hiring help to set up campaigns
example_intents: I'm interested in Pinterest account management services
Do you know where I can hire someone to set up my campaign?
Can Tailwind manage my account for me?
professional_services_inquiry.engineering_fix: Marketing/sales referral - not a product issue

smartbio_configuration.description: Questions about smart.bio link customization, changing URL handle, profile settings
example_intents: How do I change my smart.bio link?
I want to update my smart.bio handle to match my new Instagram
How do I customize my smart.bio page?
smartbio_configuration.engineering_fix: Smart.bio settings UI, handle change flow, documentation

unsupported_platform_inquiry.description: Questions about platforms Tailwind doesn't support - eBay, TikTok, LinkedIn, etc.
example_intents: Can I use Tailwind with my eBay store?
Does Tailwind work with TikTok?
I want to schedule LinkedIn posts
unsupported_platform_inquiry.engineering_fix: Marketing clarity on supported platforms, feature request tracking

pin_editing_question.description: Questions about editing pins - fixing mistakes, changing links, bulk operations on drafts
example_intents: I made a spelling mistake on my pins, can I fix it?
How do I delete all my draft pins?
Can I change the link on a scheduled pin?
pin_editing_question.engineering_fix: Pin editor UX, bulk operations, draft management UI

original_publisher_access.description: User requesting access to Original Publisher or new publisher features
example_intents: I need access to the Original Publisher feature
How do I get the new publisher?
original_publisher_access.engineering_fix: Feature flag enablement, account upgrade path, rollout communication

dashboard_version_issue.description: User stuck on old/outdated dashboard version, not migrated to new experience
example_intents: My client's account has an older dashboard
Why am I still seeing the old interface?
dashboard_version_issue.engineering_fix: Account migration scripts, version detection, migration triggers

multi_account_question.description: Questions about managing multiple accounts, different email addresses, team features
example_intents: Can I add accounts from different email addresses?
How do I manage multiple Pinterest accounts?
multi_account_question.engineering_fix: Plan documentation, multi-account UI, team features education

dashboard_loading_error.description: Dashboard won't load, shows errors, spins indefinitely, or displays outdated interface
example_intents: My dashboard keeps saying an error occurred
The page just spins and never loads
I'm seeing an outdated dashboard
dashboard_loading_error.engineering_fix: Frontend error handling, loading states, account migration, caching issues

communities_feature_question.description: Questions about Tailwind Communities - how they work, joining, previewing, submitting content
example_intents: How do Tailwind Communities work?
I'm trying to preview a community but it won't load
How do I join a Tailwind Community?
communities_feature_question.engineering_fix: Communities UX, loading performance, onboarding, feature education

ai_language_mismatch.description: AI generates content in wrong language - Spanish instead of English, etc.
example_intents: My Smart Pin was created in Spanish
Ghostwriter generated text in the wrong language
How do I change the language setting?
ai_language_mismatch.engineering_fix: Language detection, user locale settings, prompt language specification

general_product_question.description: General questions about product capabilities, pricing, or getting started - USE ONLY when no other theme fits
example_intents: What can Tailwind do?
How do I get started?
general_product_question.engineering_fix: Onboarding improvement, marketing site clarity, help center, feature education

misdirected_inquiry.description: Message not about Tailwind - spam, wrong company, promotional responses, verification codes
example_intents: [Message about unrelated product]
[Response to marketing email from different company]
[Google verification code]

unclassified_needs_review.description: Issue doesn't fit existing themes well - needs human review to determine if new theme is needed
example_intents: [Conversation that doesn't match any known theme pattern]
unclassified_needs_review.engineering_fix: Review queue - analyze after backfill to identify new theme patterns
